actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend section 302 (c) of the Labor-Management Relations Act of 1947.

summary.text: Amends the Labor-Management Relations Act to authorize an employer to make contributions to a pooled or individual trust fund established by an employee representative for the purpose of providing or defraying the costs of motor vehicle, homeowners multiple peril, fire, or other insurance benefits for employees, their families and dependents.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 302 (c) of the Labor-Management Relations Act of 1947.
